discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: For now, this is only about uniformity of the existing content. Another commit will deal with the additional recent changes.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: Since real_closed was never released, I wonder if it is worth mentioning?

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: Since complex.v had never been released, I wonder if it is worth mentioning?

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: My intention was to update this line at the last minute, including the correct date of the release.

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: Good point, in fact I hesitated to include this line but see my next comment.

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: This paragraph was in the previous version of the ChangeLog (and was written by yoursefl?): I just made minor spelling/English editions. Since it mentioned  library complex, I felt we needed to explain what happened or withdraw everything. I chose the most conservative option to trigger discussion. I am very fine with removal.

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment:
I think the style is to indent as in 
```
   * fooo
     bar
```

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment: I think that things not in the (released) library should not be mentioned here

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment: I think these should go (we already have a line saying that the plugin is in Coq).

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment: I think we could say: the repo has been cleaned up and it now only contains released stuff (in particular odd roder & co were moved to other repos under the mathcomp organization)

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: You mean compatibility is lost, right?

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: Yeah, I've been lazy for this draft and kept what Emacs did for me... I will correct the style.

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: Should it go somewhere in a Coq change log? It's bit fine-grained for the CHANGES.

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment: I think one needs a leading `*` here

commits.author: amahboubi
commits.message:
Improved ChangeLog

One paragraph per version + spell check

commits.author: amahboubi
commits.message: Latest changes added to change log.
